title: 12/30/20 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/30/20 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this December 30th, 2020 Best Of edition of The Herd, Colin discusses the possibility of the Cowboys making the playoffs and the difference between backup QB Andy Dalton and Dak Prescott. He also thinks one NFL team might have to make a difficult decision regarding their franchise QB as we approach the week of the regular season. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to tell Colin why he’s crazy for having Patrick Mahomes 3rd in the MVP race.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
